name: Cropbuster
description:
This game was made by Hugo Serinese and Andrew Bradbury.

Farmer Roy is getting ready for Harfest with his prized carrots, apples and pumpkins. But now he has to deal with ladybugs and grasshoppers coming in and ruining his crops. The only weapon he has to fend off the bugs is his own crops! Pick up the crops near to and click on the left mouse button to fire at them. Each one has a different ability. But they all won't stay in mint condition. So be careful not to be too wasteful.

Note, there might still be some bugs in it. And updates will come soon

Controls:

Move - A & D or Up & Down Arrows

Climb - W or Up Arrow

Pick Up Item - Z Key

Shoot - Left Mouse Click

Restart Level - R Key

Escape to Main Menu - Esc Key
